x: Buoyant Weight of Sand in petri dish at beginning of experiment
Visual estimate of the percent of sand that spilled out of petri dish
Final Volume of Sand (cm3) measured by displacement; only for 8 samples
Final Dry Wt of Sand (g) after drying at 60C for >48 hours
Surface Area (cm2) of Sand based on area of petri dish; same for all samples
Estimated Final volume (cm3) of Sand based on regression between measured volume vs dry weight (n=8,Rsq=0.999)
Ashed weight (g) of Sand after combustion at 550C for 4 hours
Ash Free Dry Weight (g) = DW - AW; weight (g) of organic matter lost on combustion
Percent Ash Free Dry Weight = AFDW/DW; percent of dry weight that is organic matter
Nutrient level assigned to the aquarium: Ambient/Medium/High
Tank Identifier; each aquarium was assigned to one of 3 tanks
Aquarium Identifier for Experiment 1; nine aquaria held coral nubbins in expt 1
Aquarium Identifier for Experiment 2; all aquaria had coral nubbins in expt 2
